phrases: Be a good apple and stay where you are.
I am so sorry to have you help me out.
You must be a student at Seika.
Oh, so there are kind boys like you, too.
You see, my daughter also goes to Seika.
Maybe it is because she is always so serious and uptight, she does not get along with boys.
I was worried at first whether she would enjoy her high school life.
She does nothing but work or study on days without school.
Should not all high school kids play or fall in love?
Or dress up or find a hobby?
Well, it is all because I am causing her so much trouble despite being her mother.
I am glad I met you.
I mean, you look very kind.
She is starting to act like a high school student recently, so I am sure she found a good friend like you.
Um, have people ever told you that you are very open?
I had a feeling that I would end up here.
I will be excusing myself now.
I have got to properly thank you.
Come on in for a tea or something.
I am sorry that we even had you fix the hallway.
Now with such a perfect repair job, that spot is the safest in the house.
Maybe we should take this opportunity to step through all the floorboards that are about to fall through.
That is dangerous to do, too.
The hall's patched up really well, but who did IT?!
It will be a long story.
So you two were close friends.
I asked him to come inside.
He helped me on the street when I dropped my apples on the ground.
He even patched up the holes in the hallway.
Nothing, it is just a coincidence.
Sis tends to be skeptical of all men.
She is kind of like that.
After all, our father left us and we are having lots of trouble.
Do not bring up such a depressing story!
That was nothing to laugh about!
Thank you for inviting me in.
Oh, sorry we could not be better hosts.
Come with me for a sec.
That were Misaki and Usui-kun, right?
And if I am not mistaken, they were holding hands.
But they are completely out of sight already.
I dragged Usui here, but now what?
Are you thinking that I plotted this, pretending to accidentally help carry the apples?
Well, I know mom's easily tricked,
but I know you are not underhanded.
Seeing where you grew up was neat.
Do not think you gained a trump card over me.
Even if our father has left us or even if the house is totally run down, I am not ashamed about it at all.
I am not talking about that.
I learned that the Ayuzawas always eat apples that way.
That is because Suzuna and I used to always ask for those as a child, and it is just a habit now.
The markings on the column were cute, too.
I bet you were cute as a child, too.
I want tons of secrets about you that only I know.
I will never let you into my house!
You are forbidden to come to my place!
You did not have to hide it from us.
Yesterday, we saw you coming out of your house with Usui-kun.
If you two were dating, you should have told us.
Usui helped my mother by chance, made his way into the house,
and I was grabbing his hands as I was dragging him out of there.
We were talking about it all last night.
Then you do not go to Usui-kun's house at all?
I do not even know his address.
It is nothing I care about.
But I think you are such a good match.
There is always the chance of them developing into a couple.
Still, do not you think Usui-kun's a little mysterious?
He comes to this not-at-all-special, completely ordinary Seika, but maybe he is actually a son of a really rich family.
I cannot imagine that at all.
After school, he goes to a high class sports club for a swim,
then goes to a high class tailor to get a new suit, then goes to a high class restaurant for a full course meal.
Sakura-san, right in the middle of your lunch box, I see something like a cake.
Sweets after lunch is a must.
Usui is always at Maid Latte after school.
I can never tell them that.
Hey, how about we pay a visit to Usui-kun's place?
This discussion about Usui-kun's life made me really curious.
You are curious too, right, Misaki?
Anyways, we first need to get a hold of Usui-kun's address.
But due to protection of personal information, rosters are not distributed these days.
I think the only way for us is to hack into the school's server and find it out from the roster there.
Shizuko, you are good with computers, right?
That is a crime, just so you know.
Then maybe we should ask him directly.
I said I am not interested in it.
Now that I think about it,
What does Usui's family look like?
Thank you for being kind to Takumi.
I cannot get any kind of image out.
Is it because he is an alien?
Why am I even thinking about this?
It is all because of Sakura.
Speak of the devil, it is Sakura.
Can you make it to where I am at right now?
Shizuko and I are tailing Usui-kun.
Usui-kun just entered a cafe at a city next to ours.
Cafe at a city next to ours?
This is also a neighboring city...
The name of the cafe is...
Have you heard of this place before, Misaki?
And that Moron Trio as well.
I have not told those two that I work here...
If they find out that Usui and the Moron Trio are regulars here...
God, I would hate to explain the whole story behind it.
Oh no, you are really sweating.
It is a bad habit of yours to overwork like that.
You should go home and rest up.
We have got enough people here, so do not worry.
We worked so hard for this day, did not we?
Today, we will not be a cheap customer that orders one Moe Moe Omelet between the three of us.
We will order the entire menu at Maid Latte.
I wonder if Misa-chan will be happy.
Will it all fit on this table?
Customer waiting on Maid Latte's entire menu?
We will now put all the food on the table.
We wanted her to see our brave heart.
Where did you come from, Misaki-san?
Rather than that, why are you tailing him?
If we do not know his address, then I figured we can follow him home.
I brought a set for you, too.
We do not have to go this far.
I am not interested in Usui's private life.
I know you are interested in it.
I can see everything that is going on in your mind.
You can never judge a person by their appearance.
I never would have imagined Usui-san visiting a maid cafe.
Maybe someone he likes works there?
I thought his favorite was you.
Hey, I am really reluctant to do things like this.
It is just as I imagined.
What a blatant name this sports club has.
I actually do not want to, but...
Wow, it looks so rich inside.
He is been coming to a place like this?
Looks like he got off on the second floor.
He is a son of a rich family.
Three people for the tour, please.
Usui-kun's really catching all the girls' eyes!
You have got to keep your eyes on Usui-kun.
Usui-san has already left the pool.
Let us wait for him outside.
It is the High Class Tailor Shop.
Yet again, just like I thought.
I wonder who he actually is.
He is a son of a rich family.
It is really spacious in here.
They could really put more items here.
We are only taking a look.
These are ready-made, but I am sure the order-mades are about twice the cost.
Such expensive clothes exist in this world?
Usui-kun does not look like he is in here.
He must have run out in surprise over the price.
He could be in the VIP Lounge.
This just makes me even more confused about him.
It is a high class restaurant.
The name of the restaurant is High Class, too.
If it is a restaurant, we cannot go in for a tour or window shopping.
It looks like our company's not here yet, so may we wait here for a while?
Is not it rude not to take the hat off?
Since it is a disguise, they will have to forgive our poor etiquette.
Would you like the drink menu?
The biggest discovery through this is how fearless Shizuko is.
She does pull it off when she has to.
Now, let us see how Usui-san's doing.
It is hard to think anyone eating alone at a restaurant like this.
Will the Usui family finally show up?
What if he is meeting with his girlfriend?
What kind of person's going to come?
Maybe she is the person Usui-kun was waiting for?
So she is the person he was waiting for?
But there are always cases where you think so, yet it turns out differently, so we cannot tell yet.
Are you sure you are going to abandon this?
I was not interested in Usui's secret to begin with.
If you are going to say that.
When did he change into a kimono?
Since it interests me, I am going to continue tailing him.
It is so dark out, too, I took my sunglasses off.
Usui-san is totally a mystery figure.
Is this intense schedule what he goes through every day?
I have had enough with investigating his secret.
Therefore, I am going to clean up Misaki's disguise set as well.
It was fun, was not it?
I will see you tomorrow, Misaki-san.
It is a short cut if you go through the park.
I guess I will go home, too.
For some reason, animals have always hated me.
You have heard how animals and babies can tell if they really are kind or not.
You act disinterested in everything, but I saw you pick up a stray cat.
I could be doing it to look good since you were following me.
You knew we were following you, huh?!
And you were having fun dragging us around?!
In that getup, it is stranger not to know.
My opinion has not changed at all!
But if you think about it,
This is the first time Ayuzawa has shown an interest in me.
If you just asked me, I would show you anything you wanted.
You are full of mystery and I can never tell what you are thinking.
So, it is true that I wanted to learn about you a little.
And after investigating what you do, now I have a good understanding.
I know that I do not care about your private life at all!
In other words, you like me no matter what my family or house is like?
What kind of interpretation does it take to get there?
Do not make any more stops, and go straight home, okay?
Yeah, and you can follow me home, too.
Thank you for looking after Misaki.
I had forgotten to give Usui-kun a souvenir.
What do you think of this?
It is the face of a doll you draw as your home business, huh?
Will he be happy with something like that?
I will give you this heavy bowl I use to work out, too.
Yup, the sport festival's coming up.
